extendedInfo.description: Decked Builder is the premium deck building app for Magic the Gathering (MTG) -- providing a sleek user interface to research decks, find cards, and then build, price and finally buy the deck that you want. FEATURES: * Find your cards - Instant search results with no Internet connection as the database is stored locally - Search for cards by any combination of card expansion, rarity, color, type or cost - Built in support for tournament formats including Standard, Modern, Extended, EDH and Classic - See only distinct cards, or find every printing of a card in every set - Full card text search -- easily find every Landfall card, Elf, Vampire or any other attribute that has ever been printed. * Build your decks - Build multiple deck listings and sideboards - Easily test sample draws from the deck, and simulate a game of Magic by playing cards to the battlefield. - Get statistics on your deck including mana curves, color symbol counts and card type percentages - Email decks to your friends - Sort and filter your deck by mana cost, color and card type* Price and buy your decks - Decked Builder contains multiple price feeds from TCGplayer.com, CoolStuffInc.com, CardShark.com, MTGOTraders.com, MagicCardMarket.eu and more!- Finding the cheapest way to put your deck together from some of the largest card suppliers on the Internet - Price your entire deck with a single tap - Easily buy your entire deck online, or just cards missing from your collection * Research decks - Decked Builder includes RSS feeds which are specially formatted for clean viewing and fast downloads. - Cards names are automatically be highlighted for instant (no network required) card lookups from the built-in database - Featured RSS feeds from TCGplayer.com, DraftMagic.com, MTGCast, PureMTGO.com, Channel Fireball, Power 9 Pro, GatheringMagic.com, StarCityGames - Deck integration with mtgo-stats.com allows you to download, analyze and test the latest winning decks directly on your device * And More! - Decked Builder features high-definition card art scans that display brilliantly on higher resolution displays - Full support for Innistrad day/night cards

reviews.title: Planeswalkers download this app!!!
reviews.comment: If you like to build decks, if you like to get the stats of the cards in your decks: GET THIS APP! You can price the decks, test the decks, and you can buy cards for your decks. Stop reading this and download this app.
reviews.author: Nick Bulkowski

reviews.title: Excellent App, would love an android tablet version
reviews.comment: This is hands down the best MTG app available.  I use it to build and test decks and manage my collection. The iPad version has the best UI, and I would love for the android version to \"catch up\" to that level of quality. Another neat feature I would like to see is a social component where you could add friends and view each other\'s collections. Keep up the great work, dev.
reviews.author: Andy Burrus

reviews.title: Great app, but greedy
reviews.comment: This app is great, and is very helpful for organizing my deck and my entire collection. However, the description doesn\'t mention that you will have to pay another $4 to create collections (as opposed to decks) and then another $5 to use the camera feature... All in all, I ended up paying $13 for an app that says it costs $4. That\'s ridiculous. For $4, can\'t you just include everything? That\'s pretty expensive for an app anyway. But if you have $15 to spare, this app is great. 5 stars if no in-app purchases.
reviews.author: Michael Price

reviews.title: As good as advertised.
reviews.comment: In future updates I hope there is a double goldfish feature. Where you can load 2 decks and playtest against yourself. They can share a similar battlefield. But the UI with the hands and graveyard can switch when you press a \"switch player\" or past turn button. It shouldn\'t be difficult to implement. I wouldn\'t mind paying more for this as an in app unlockable. Any competitive mtg player would find this very useful.
reviews.author: Ivan Pei

reviews.title: Broken on Samsung Galaxy SII
reviews.comment: Cant delete deck. Cant add new deck. Menus don\'t respond. Zero instructions.
reviews.author: leon templin

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Great MTG resource.
reviews.author: Jacob Thomas

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Pretty Good all around!
reviews.author: Christopher Cochran

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best app for tracking your collection and building your decks.
reviews.author: Bill Elftman Jr

reviews.comment: Handy
reviews.author: Freddie Salonga

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This saves me the work of buying a deck before I test it out. I can build all possibilities, see how the deck plays all before actually getting the cards. I use this often, great job!
reviews.author: Raashaad Jones

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I use this every day to track cards i want. Anyone have any glimpse the unthinkables?? Haha  Would like it if you could select which set you add to you\'re deck. I don\'t have alpha duals, i want to look up revised duals but don\'t know how to switch.
reviews.author: Phillip sundeen

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really love the app. Wish it kept count of the library graveyard etc. 5 stars baby! BIYF BIYF BIYF
reviews.author: Richard Harrison

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I do plenty of competitive play and this saves so much ink on not needing proxys to test and see how decks look. great for on the go.
reviews.author: Drew Nexsen

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Perfect for researching cards and discovering combos. One thing I wish it had was the ability to search for keywords in card text. Type in \"flying\" and all cards with flying in the text come up. That would rock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing, a must own app of your a MTG player.
reviews.author: Tyler Crowley

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: Great app for any mid to advanced mtg player, ability to create and test draw any deck before you buy and build. Two thumbs and \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205
reviews.author: Kyle Doe

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, frequent updates, love dropbox integration.
reviews.author: Andrew Chekerylla

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is an extremely well put together app. It functions extremely well, and even has features like the ability to test out decks you\'ve constructed. I have 2 problems with it though. 1) No life counter. C\'mon. Simple math? Really? Lol 2) The test deck feature is a bit touch with the swipe features. Swipe right for battlefield, left for hand, and more often than not, I end up summoning creatures when I meant to just scroll up
reviews.author: Nicholas Schoenbein

reviews.title: would give a negative star if i could
reviews.comment: Crappy version on android, nothing delivered as promised. deck building is cumbersome and slow, not meant for tablets, look bland  touch gestures and function could be optimize further to be a good app. reported to developer and heard nothing. the only time i purchase an app and i regretted. this is nothing like the ipad version. far from it.  asked for a refund but no reply whatsoever.
reviews.author: gary anwar

reviews.title: Crappy version of what was promised
reviews.comment: In the description and reviews this app looks like it will help you build your decks by analyzing your manna curb and letting you test it. It does do these things but it is the bare minimum by any standards. It tells you how many of each mana cost u have not how to improve it, and the testing is less than the skeleton of mtg sim game it literally let\'s you shift a card from any position you want to any other position(there is no removed from play option). This app is not worth money I regret it.
reviews.author: Adrian Garcia
